Context: The George Brown College Security staff are qualified with Ministry-approved Security guard licenses, Use of Force (including handcuffing and baton), first aid/CPR, WHMIS, Smart Serve, conflict de-escalation, positive space training, and dispatch training. Site Supervisors have Basic Emergency Management and leadership training. The main Security Desk contact information is 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca. For campus Security Desk locations, check the Contact and Security Locations page. The information on this website is subject to change without notice. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
